column4: It sounds like the policykit isn't running for whatever reason.
If you open a terminal and run:  ps -ef | grep '[p]olkit-gnome'   # does it output anything?
In the same terminal, run it manually:  /usr/lib/policykit-1-gnome/polkit-gnome-authentication-agent-1
Oh, that means you mistyped the command
You probably forgot the ending ' quote
Ah ok, it's running, then my guess was wrong :/
yes.its running.But sometime when I try to download and installa software I have problems. Im behind a proxy
im in office having a firewall
Well, there shouldn't be any difference in downloading a package with the software center and synaptic
I get this "W: Failed to fetch http://in.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/natty-updates/multiverse/binary-i386/Packages  407  Proxy Authentication Required "
